messages.message:
Also heads up that the Cypress sandboxes are unable to start because of the AWS issue we're having since last week. Here's a workaround if you're motivated to ssh into your PR sandbox:
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1753073546111569
actually, this workaround isn't working for me TT let me see if what's going on

Update on Cypress sandboxes + AWS ECR issue, I got a hack fix working to unblock PRs.

If you got a PR that's failing to create the Crafting sandbox, do the following:
1. ssh into your sandbox `cs ssh --workspace pr-<PR_NUMBER>-cypress/dev`
2. Go to https://d-9067ba412e.awsapps.com/start/#/?tab=accounts
3. Go to `instabase-dev` > `aws-powerUserAccess` > `Access keys`
4. Copy Option 1 (the one with `export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=...` )
5. Paste your clipboard (that exports AWS credentials) into your sandbox ssh
6. Then run this god forsaken one-liner in your sandbox:
```echo -e '#!/bin/bash\necho "'$(aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2)'"' \
  | sudo tee /usr/local/bin/aws.tmp > /dev/null \
  && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/aws.tmp \
  && sudo mv /usr/local/bin/aws.tmp /usr/local/bin/aws ```
7. In a browser, visit https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes and find your sandbox
8. Suspend your sandbox, then resume it.
9. Go into your Github Cypress action and re-run all jobs.

Your sandbox should be working after 10 minutes + get Cypress results in your PR.

Let me know if you have issues
